text: Ya ku waɗanda suka yi imani! Idan an ce muka, "Ku yalwata a cikin majalisai," to, ku yalwata, sai Allah Ya yalwata muku, kuma idan an ce muku, "Ku tashi" to, ku tashi. Allah na ɗaukaka waɗanda suka yi imani daga cikinku da waɗanda aka bai wa ilim wasu darajoji masu yawa, kuma, Allah Mai ƙididdigewa ne ga dukan kome
